Package com.example.Bank.Services.Imp

Class ChatGroupServiceImp

java.lang.Object
com.example.Bank.Services.Imp.ChatGroupServiceImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatGroupService
@Service public class ChatGroupServiceImp extends Object implements ChatGroupService
Service implementation for managing chat groups.

This class implements the ChatGroupService interface and provides methods for interacting with chat groups, such as retrieving, creating, and adding messages to chat groups.

Usage: Implement this class to manage chat groups and handle operations related to chat groups.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pedro Pereira

  • Method Details

    • getChatGroup

      public List<ChatGroupResponse> getChatGroup(String contractNumber, Integer page, Integer size)
      Retrieves a list of chat groups associated with the specified contract number.
      Specified by:
      getChatGroup in interface ChatGroupService
      Parameters:
      contractNumber - The contract number associated with the user.
      page - The page number of results to retrieve.
      size - The number of results per page.
      Returns:
      A list of chat group responses.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessError - if the chat groups do not exist.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      contractNumber - The contract number associated with the user.
      groupId - The ID of the chat group to retrieve.
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • createGroup

      public ChatGroupResponse createGroup(String contractNumber, CreateChatGroup createChatGroup)
      Creates a new chat group with the specified description and members.
      Specified by:
      createGroup in interface ChatGroupService
      Parameters:
      contractNumber - The contract number associated with the user creating the chat group.
      createChatGroup - The details of the chat group to create.
      Returns:
      The created chat group response.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessError - if any of the specified IBANs do not exist.

    • addMessage

      public ChatGroupResponse addMessage(String contractNumber, MessageRequest messageRequest, UUID groupId)
      Adds a message to the specified chat group.
      Specified by:
      addMessage in interface ChatGroupService
      Parameters:
      contractNumber - The contract number associated with the user adding the message.
      messageRequest - The message to add to the chat group.
      groupId - The ID of the chat group to which the message will be added.
      Returns:
      The updated chat group response.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessError - if the chat group does not exist.
